casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Chester Brigg SYKES. No. 461P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Elizabeth Strickland, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, Rex Gore, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of September 2007 by Defendant for Interlocutory Order on Appellate Jurisdiction from the North Carolina Court of Appeals Number COA07-537:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of October 2007."
